title: Hi, wanna hear a story about what the most Overpowered thing in League of Legends is currently?

replies.body: isn't it only a weaker hextech gunblade?
no it isnt a weaker hextech, hextech is the archetype of BoTRK. Guinsoo is an extremely strong item when paired with items or champion e.g Kog'maw, Xin Zhao or jax
